intro: ðŸ‘‹ Hi! I'm Eva. In June 2022 I graduated with a bachelor in Software Development from the Hague University of Applied Sciences. Ever since I've been working as a .NET consultant at Quintor.
agile: I thrive in agile, interdisciplinary teams, actively engaging in every phase of the software development lifecycle. This includes refining work items, participating in iterative development, and overseeing continuous integration and deployment. I am skilled in setting up and optimizing pipelines, conducting thorough testing, and delivering clear demos.
backend: During both my internships as well as at my current job I've used .NET for backend developement. I am experienced in building .NET solutions and maintaining and updating existing applications. To ensure high-quality code, I use design patterns and adhere to SOLID principles, utilize Test-Driven Development (TDD), and implement automated testing.
databases: A backend needs a database. I have experience in both database-first and code-first database design, as well as using Entity Framework, designing and maintaining database schemas, and writing and optimizing SQL queries. I also have experience with Azure Storage.
frontend: Although my primary focus has been on backend development I am also well versed in creating and maintaining front-end applications using Javascript or Angular and really enjoy the process of designing these. Of course this is always paired with good testing, ideally using a WebDriver like Selenium.
testing: To ensure high-quality and maintainable code, I use various forms of testing. I have experience with different test frameworks including xUnit, NUnit, Karma & Jasmine.
azure: I have obtained the Azure Developer Associate certification. In practice, I have experience with Azure DevOps and various cloud services.
world: ðŸŒ¼ I am committed to creating a better world and I'm passionate about topics like climate, sustainability and human rights.

education.school: The Hague University of Applied Sciences

consultant.bullet1: As a consultant at Quintor, I have contributed to various small-scale projects and two major assignments detailed below.
consultant.bullet2: Participated in a masterclass designed to integrate young professionals into the workplace.

devops.bullet1: Developed and maintained a .NET API utilized by credit analysts to identify and register credit risk hierarchies for clients.
devops.bullet2: Provided operational support, resolved incidents, and implemented Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to enhance system reliability and scalability.

fullstack.bullet1: Developed a web application using Angular and a .NET API for managing environmental tax registrations.
fullstack.bullet2: Leveraged Azure DevOps for continuous integration and deployment.
